Su fuente de ingresos es la producción y comercialización de café teniendo mucha experiencia en este rubro ya que desde muy joven trabaja en la agricultura las plantas que ella y su hijo trabajan fueron sembradas por su esposo quien falleció hace algún tiempo. Sus cultivos de café están ubicados muy cerca de su casa de habitación, como ventaja gracias a ello ella pueda dar asistencia y mantenimiento diariamente en compañía de su hijo; pero como único desafió que ella encuentra es la alza de los precios en los insumos que son utilizados para asistir el café ya que el precio de estos en el mercado es inestable y va de forma ascendente. 
Sus metas son las de mantener sanos y muy bien asistidos sus cultivos de café ya que por medio de las ganancias de este producto ella cubre las necesidades en el hogar y con los estudios de sus hijos siendo ella el único apoyo que ellos tienen. Sus sueños son los de poder seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios para que ellos puedan prepararse, ser personas con mejores oportunidades en la vida, mejores ideas para emprender negocios y ayudarla cuando ella ya no tenga fuerzas para trabajar. 
Martina ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para poder comprar insumos agrícolas con los cuales podrá comprar insumos para poder asistir sus cultivos de café y cumplir con sus ideales, metas, esperanzas y sueños en su vida.
texts.en:
Martine, 35, is a single mother (she's a widow) of 4 children. The eldest daugter is in secondary school, two girls study in primary school and her son is the only one involved in the coffee business.

Her source of income is the production and sale of coffee, she has a lot of experience in this field as she has worked in agriculture since she was very young. The plants that she and her son tend were planted by her husband who died some time ago. Their crops are located very near to their home, which is an advantage as it means she can tend them daily accompanied with her son. The main disadvantage that is the rise in price of the supplies used to grow coffee as the prices in the market are unstable and are rising.

Her goals are to keep her coffee crops healthy and well cared for as she uses the earnings from this product to cover the household expenses and to pay for her children's education as she is the only support that they have. Her dreams are to be able to continue supporting her children's education so that they can be prepared for the best opportunities in life, have better ideas for business and to support her when she can no longer work.

Martina has requested financing from COMIXMUL in order to buy agricultural supplies to tend to her coffee crops and fulfil her ideals, goals, hopes and dreams for the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her grow coffee.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y pagó el gasto del hogar, ella continua perteneciendo al banco comunal “Santa Ana” y sigue enseñando en uno de los colegios de la zona, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal como por ejemplo pagar el agua y la luz. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Alicia's grateful to the lenders for the loan, and she paid her household expenses.  She's still with Santa Ana Communal Bank and teaching in one of the area schools.

Alicia needs the current loan for personal expenses such as paying the water and electric bills.  She's grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to pay for water and electricity

loans.name: Gocha

texts.en:
This is Gocha, who is 24 years old and lives in the village of Kveda Sazano. He is single and lives with his parents. Gocha and his family members run a small-scale agricultural business and breed two milk cows. The family sells cheese for selling in grazing season, when the cows get milk.

As their earnings are not enough to cover utilities and food costs, Gocha has decided to diversify the business and start a small café in his district. According to Gocha’s estimations, sales will be high as the location where he plans to start his cafe is crowded with people. He has already hired the commercial space and needs money to purchase all the needed equipment and raw materials. 

The income from the café will be a great support for the family as it will generate additional income. Gocha appreciates your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase all the needed equipment and raw materials for starting a small food cafe in his district.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy uniform materials.

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman has been involved in stone grinding for more than 4 years. He earns his and his family's living by providing different stone grinding services to local stone manufacturing firms. Arman lives with his wife and one-year-old son in Arjut village of Lori region. Due to the tireless work that Arman has been doing over these years, he perfectly managed to sustain his family's living. 

Now, by asking this loan, Arman needs to purchase stone powder to be able to provide stone grinding services to one of the local companies. He has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is highly important for Arman to be able to complete the order received from his customer and continue his stone grinding business.

loans.use: to pay for stone powder to provide stone grinding service.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos de 68 años de edad, estudio hasta 7° grado, es acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, son padres de 4 hijos, de los cuales 3 trabajan con él, también viven sus nietos.

Carlos se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace  40 años y a la ganadería, el trabajo lo aprendió por su padre. También se dedica a jornalero, el trabajo le queda a media hora de su casa viaja a pie, con él se involucra su hijo. 

El préstamo lo utilizara,  para mejorar su vivienda, ya que la casa se encuentra en malas condiciones, comprara polines y lamina para arreglar el techo.
texts.en:
Carlos, 68, studied until the 7th grade. He is married and his wife is engaged in household chores. They are the parents of 4 children of which 3 work with him. He also lives with his grandchildren.

Carlos earns his living in agriculture and raising livestock which he has done for 40 years. He learned this work from his father. He is also a day laborer who works a half an hour from his home with his son. 

This loan will be used to improve his home since the house is in poor condition. He will buy wooden beams and shingles to fix the roof.

loans.use: to purchase wooden beams and shingles to fix his roof and improve his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Mupa

texts.en: Mupa is happy that she took a loan from Kiva and she was able to pay back the loan fully without challenges. She has seen growth in her business and she feels it is the time to pump in more capital. She now seeks another loan to buy rice, sugar and soap for her business. The profits from the previous loan helped to pay school fees for her children and she was also able to improve her standard of living. The challenges that she faces in the business include the competition and the pricing of commodities that sometimes cuts into the income, especially during the low season.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and soap for her business.

loans.name: Eric Pascal

texts.en:
Eric is a Cameroonian, age 39, and married with four children; the oldest is ten and in secondary school, while the youngest is two and in nursery school. He has been in this business for the past four years, which makes him very experienced, and his business stable and profitable. 

His business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This loan will increase his turnover by one hundred percent. His standard of living will be improved too.

loans.use: to buy stuff (soft drinks , biscuit , candy ,bread , soap, etc.) for his provisions store.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en: Mariama is a Cameroonian, forty-one-years-old and married with four children.  The oldest is twelve-years-old and is in secondary school, while the youngest is three-years-old in nursery school. She has been in this business for the past three years which makes her very experienced and stable. Her business is located in an urban center near an administrative area with many potential customers. This loan will increase her profit by 65 percent. Her standard of living will be improved as well.

loans.use: to buy a used photocopier for her business.

loans.name: Kernedy Ane

texts.en: He has taken another loan because the first loan is fully paid. This loan will help him buy leather and other materials for the fabrication of shoes. The last loan helped him make a profit of more than sixty percent. His standard of living and that of his family has change positively.

loans.use: to buy leather and other materials to form shoes.

loans.name: Glenda Dina

texts.es:
Glenda es una joven de 27 años de edad, madre de 4 hijos que son menores los cuales estudian, en estado civil de unión libre la cual cuenta con un grado de escolaridad de primaria incompleta que no pudo culminar por la falta de apoyo económico ya que sus padres son de escasos recursos. Gracias al emprendimiento, confianza y compromiso que ella tiene, la cooperativa COMIXMUL la ha apoyado en todas y cada una de las veces que ella ha solicitado financiamiento para poder invertir en sus cultivos de papa creyendo en el pequeño productor y depositando confianza en esta clase de sector necesitado. Gracias a este rubro Glenda genera ingresos para el mantenimiento de su hogar y su familia con lo cual ayuda a la compra de calzado, medicinas con muchas restricciones, ropa, etc. que son necesarias para el cuidado y desarrollo de la salud. Fue gracias a sus padres que ella aprendió a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad ya que ellos por generaciones han sido agricultores y siempre han trabajado la tierra. Sus clientes son los diferentes intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos y amigos. Sus cultivos están ubicados a 100 metros de distancia desde su casa de habitación a los cuales se traslada caminando por lo que también tiene la ventaja de asistir sus cultivos.
Sus planes y metas a futuro son los de poder arreglar su casa de habitación misma que necesita un techo digno, repello en sus paredes, y un piso de cemento evitando de esta manera la contaminación de virus en el sistema respiratorio por medio de la humedad en las paredes entre otras que están como familia propensas a sufrir. Como madre seguir apoyando a sus hijos con todas sus fuerzas para que ellos puedan graduarse a nivel superior y puedan ser personas de bien en la vida. Por lo que hoy día ella solicita una vez más apoyo financiero para la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que podrá asistir sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Glenda is a 27 year old mother of 4 young children who attend school. She is partnered in a common law marriage and she could not complete primary school because of the lack of financial support, as her parents did not have many economic resources. 
Thanks to her business venture and their trust in the commitment she has, the cooperative COMIXMUL has supported her every single time she has requested funding to invest in her potato crops because they believe in small producers and supporting this necessary sector with confidence. Thanks to this support, Glenda generates revenue for the maintenance of her household and family which helps with buying shoes, medicines with many restrictions, clothing, and more that are necessary for the minding and development of health. 
It was thanks to her parents that Glenda learned to work the land at an early age because they have been farmers for generations and have always worked the land. Her customers are the different intermediaries who come to the area as well as neighbors and friends. Her crops are located 100 meters away from her house which means that she has to walk to attend to her crops. 
Her plans and future goals are to be able to fix her house that needs a decent roof, plaster on the walls, and a cement floor so that they can avoid the contamination of viruses of the respiratory system that are passed between family members due to the humidity in the walls. 
As a mother, she will continue to support her children with all of her strength so that they can graduate to the next level and be good people in life. So today she again requests financial support for the purchase of agricultural inputs so that she may attend to her potato crops.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs for her potato crops.

loans.name: Naftal

texts.pt:
Naftal tem 37  anos de idade, casado e pai  de 03 filhos. Ele trabalha das 07 horas até as 15horas numa instituição de apoio a desfavorecidos como controlador de stocks. 
Com o empréstimo pretende comprar  material de construção( banheiras, lavatório e tijoleiras) para usar na construção da sua casa.
O seu maior sonho é de aumentar e terminar a sua casa e comprar mobiliário para melhorar as condições de habitação  e terminar a sua formação no ensino superior.
 Seu desafio é de pagar o seu empréstimo dentro do periodo pré-estabelecido de forma a pedir outro, Bem como criar os seus filhos.
texts.en:
Naftal is 37 years old, married and the father of 3 children. He works from 07h00 to 15h00 at an institution that supports the disadvantaged as a stock controller.

With this loan he plans to buy construction materials (bathtub, sink and bricks) to use in building his house.

His biggest dream is to expand and finish his house, to buy furniture to improve his living conditions and to finish his university education.

His challenge is to pay back his loan within the pre-agreed term in order to ask for another one, as well as to raise his children.

loans.use: buy construction materials (bathtub, sink and bricks)

loans.name: Nora

texts.pt:
Nora tem 34  anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 03 filhos. A sua base de sustento é o negócio ela trabalha todo dia vendendo bebidas diversas em sua casa para reforçar as suas receitas, trabalha no balcão de um restaurante.
Com o empréstimo pretende comprar  productos alimentares diversos como( bebidas, refregerantes, e outros ) para revender.
O seu maior sonho é de aumentar a sua casa e comprar mobiliário para melhorar as condições de habitação .
 Seu desafio é diversificar os produtos que vende para satisfazer a demanda.
texts.en:
Nora is 34 years old, single and the mother of 3 children. Her income comes from her business and she works every day selling various drinks from her home. To add to her revenues, she also works behind the bar is a restaurant.

With this loan she plans to buy various food products (such as drinks, sodas and other) to resell.

Her biggest challenge is to expand her house and buy furniture to improve her living conditions. Her challenge is to diversify her product offering to satisfy demand.

loans.use: buy various food products (such as drinks, sodas and other)

loans.name: Brenda Lisseth

texts.es: Brenda habita en el municipio de masaya, soltera trabajadora su mayor sueño es tener su casa propia, sus padres le han heredado un pedaso de terreno donde esta construyendo un cuarto para acondicionarlo y poder vivir alli, ella trabaja para una Universidad Privada, el credito lo solicita para comprar. bloques, hierro, estribos, cemento, arena, etc. agradecida por el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le estan brindado ya que por medio de ellos podra cumplir uno de sus sueños.
texts.en:
Brenda lives in the municipality of Masaya. She is single and hardworking, and her greatest dream is to have her own house. Her parents inherited a piece of land where she is building a house and equipping it so that she can live there. Brenda works for a private university.

Brenda is requesting this loan to buy blocks, iron, supports, cement and sand, etc. She says that she is grateful for the support that Kiva and the field partner are giving her, because with their support she will be able to realize one of her dreams.

loans.use: to buy blocks, iron, supports, cement and sand, etc.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: Paulina continua brindando servicio de transporte interprovincial y sigue participando en el banco comunal “Santa Ana” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro entonces va comprar llantas. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Paulina continues to provide interprovincial transportation service and still participates in the Santa Ana communal bank.  At this moment she requires the loan in order to perform maintenance on her vehicle - she is going to buy tires.  

She is thankful and appreciative of the loan, and promises to complete her monthly repayments on time and very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es: Este es el nuevo grupo  “El Progreso” conformada por 07 socios dispuestos a comenzar a trabajar en equipo. Carmen de 36 años es casada con 02 hijos menores de edad. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación Carmen ha logrado apoyar a su familia, pues actualmente cuenta con 02 motos taxis la cual lo trabaja su esposo y ella brindado servicio de transporte.  Solicitó el crédito para darle mantenimientos a sus motos. Su mayor deseo es de instalar un puesto donde pueda vender prendas de vestir. El nuevo grupo “El Progreso” agradecen a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Carmen está ubicada en la parte de adelante y viste chaleco marón y pantalón rosado.
texts.en: This is the new group "El Progreso" that is made up of 7 partners who are willing to begin working as a team. Carmen, 36, is married with 2 minor children. With great effort and dedication, Carmen has managed to support her family. She currently has 2 motorcycle taxis with which she and her husband provide services. She requested a loan for the maintenance of their motorcycles. Her biggest goal is to purchase a market stall where she can sell clothing. The new group "El Progreso" thanks the people who make this loan possible. Carmen is located in the front in the brown vest and pink pants.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of motorcycle taxis.

loans.name: Cristo Rey Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Cristo Rey  está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Faviola es una de las integrantes, quien trabaja de manera exhaustiva, para poder ayudar a su familia. Es una persona muy luchadora, que con mucho esfuerzo pudo salir adelante, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas variadas, y así es que está procurando poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
Solicita de este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas, ya que se acerca la época en la que más venta tiene y quiere poder seguir dando a sus clientes buenos productos.
texts.en:
The "Cristo Rey" group is on its fourth loan cycle as part of the women's committee programme.  The group comes from the city of Concepción, a little way away from the centre of the country.  It is a growing area but difficult to access.  The members of "Cristo Rey" group want to fight to keep growing and to make their home region better and fight so that they can gradually grow too.

Faviola is one member of the group and she works tirelessly in order to be able to help her family.  Faviola is very feisty and, with a lot of effort, has been able to prosper.  Faviola makes a living selling various items and endeavours to continue supporting her family.

Faviola is applying for this loan in order to buy various items of clothing.  The season for high sales is approaching and Faviola wants to keep offering her customers good products.

loans.use: to buy various clothing items to sell.

loans.name: Elva Ysabel

texts.es:
Elva Ysabel tiene 57 años de edad, vive en su casa propia en el distrito de Cayalti, su población se dedica al comercio, agricultura y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos para el hogar y prendas de vestir, desde hace más de 10 años, sus ventas los realiza en su distrito y zonas aledañas al mismo.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mercadería para su negocio ropa de temporada primavera – verano y artículo de cocina y de manera ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elva Ysabel is 57 years old and lives in a home of her own in the Cayalti district, located two hours from Chiclayuo on the northern coast of Peru.  The people there are merchants, farmers, and raise livestock.

She sells household products and clothing and has done so for more than 10 years and makes her sales within her district and in the surrounding areas.

She is asking for a loan of 3,000 Soles to buy merchandise for her business, such as spring and summer clothing and kitchen items so she can offer a greater variety to her customers.  This will allow her to earn a greater income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Arusyak

texts.en:
Arusyak is a young and enthusiastic lady from Armavir town. After graduating from the university she started to provide computer training to local students. She prepares different term papers, essays and trainings for local students and gets income which is enough for covering her daily costs. 

As a young and hardworking lady, Arusyak is well known among students and she receives a lot of orders during a month. Unfortunately, her computer has broken down and she isn't able to continue her work. By applying for this loan Arusyak asks financial support for being able to purchase a new computer. 

She has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is very important for Arusyak to be able to continue her work. She hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for a new computer for the preparation of term papers, essays and trainings.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en: Monicah is a widowed woman. She has three children. She describes herself as a committed person. She operates a grocery store where she sells groceries. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. This will benefit four family members.  She will also add stock of grocery products for resale.

loans.use: buy a water tank to store clean water and add stock of grocery products.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer is a 28-year-old married woman. She has one child who is nine years old. She operates a beauty salon where she offers hair dressing services. She describes her family challenge to be lack of enough water. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. This will benefit three family members.

loans.use: buy a water tank to store clean water.

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
Alvard is a hairdresser with three years of experience working in that field. From the small rented space in one of the local beauty salons, Alvard provides different types of hairdressing services. She is very kind and careful toward her clients who value the service that Alvard greatly provides. 
Now for being able to increase her working capital, Alvard needs financial support. She asks for this loan to be able to purchase materials and tools needed for her work. She has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan will greatly assist Alvard to serve her clients in better way and will increase the quality of work she provides.
Alvard lives alone in the town of Vanadzor as her only son serves in the army.

loans.use: to pay for materials and tools to provide a hairdressing service.

loans.name: Kyabugimbi Twetungure Group

texts.en:
Kyabugimbi is a new group located in Kitondo Kyabugimbi Ntungamo district. It is comprised of men and women whose major activity is farming. They are all married with their children in schools. 

They applied for a loan of UGX 3,900,000 as a group which will be shared between the individuals. They have the challenge of low production within their businesses due to poor farming methods -- banana wilt among others. 

Their prime target is to change the lives of their families and also to take their children to better schools rather than having them get a poor education. However, they have limited capital funds to enable them to achieve their dreams. 

With this loan they believe their production will improve as will their lifestyle and their society. Betty will use her loan to buy pesticides and better quality seeds. At the back in a tie and jacket is the Ugafode credit officer who is charge of them.

loans.use: To buy seeds and pesticides.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is a new borrower, age 35 years old, and married with two children. He deals in the sale of onions, and has a banana plantation from which he gets bananas for home consumption and sells the surplus. 

He applied for a loan of 1,500,000 UGX, to improve his farming methods through pruning and weeding. He has a challenge of little business turnover from his commercial farming and low market purchase, so he decided to come to UGAFODE for a loan to hire manpower and expand both his farmland and agriculture.

In the photograph is Nicholas, his wife, and guarantor (left to right); they signed the waiver form.

loans.use: to hire laborers expand both his farmland and agriculture.
